John Emery (May 20, 1905 rụo November 16, 1964) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri, redio na telivishọn.
A mụrụ ya na New York City, Emery bụ nwa nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Edward Emery (ihe dị ka na afọ1861 rụo afọ 1938) na Isabel Waldron (1871 na 1950)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na La Salle Military Academy nke Long Island.

Site na ngwụcha afọ 1930 ruo na mmalite afọ 1960 ọ pụtara na nkwado ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke Hollywood, ọ malitere na James Whale's The Road Back (1937) na site na Alfred Hitchcock's Spellbound ruo Rocketship X-M.
A makwaara Emery maka ọrụ telivishọn ya, ọ na-apụta na ihe mmemme dịka I Love Lucy na Have Gun Will Travel
N'afọ 1946, ọ pụtara na mmemme redio dị ka onye nchọpụta Philo Vance.

Emery lụrụ Patricia Calvert na afọ 1926, na-agwụ na ịgba alụkwaghịm na afọ 1929, tupu ọrụ ihe nkiri ya. Ọ lụrụ Tallulah Bankhead na August 31, 1937 na Jasper, Alabama (naanị alụmdi na nwunye ya), gbaa alụkwaghịm na June 13, 1941 na Reno, Nevada
Ha abụọ nọgidere bụrụ enyi mgbe ha lụsịrị

N'afọ 1942, Emery lụrụ onye na-agba egwú Tamara Geva, ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1963. Emery malitere mmekọrịta ogologo oge na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Joan Bennett na 1961, onye lekọtara ya site na ọrịa ikpeazụ ya na ọnwụ ya na 1964.
N'ihi ọdịdị ha, a na-ekwukarị na Emery bụ nwa John Barrymore. Dị ka nwatakịrị, Emery na Barrymore na nwunye mbụ ya, Katherine Corri nọrọ nwa oge.
Emery nwụrụ na Nọvemba 16, 1964 na New York City, mgbe ọ dị arọ ịrị ise na iteolu
